title: Chicken Stock
meta: Rotisserie chickens work well for carcasses

directions.text: Stir 4 cups of water with gelatin and let it sit for 10 mins.
Add gelatin water to the dutch oven.
Add all ingredients into a dutch oven and add enough cold water to cover.
Bring to a simmer for 45 mins while skimming off any scum.
Discard all large bits and fine strain the stock returning the result to a simmer for 10 mins.
Allow to rest for 15mins and then skim off all scum.
